00122 class EGS_COLLIMATED_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_CollimatedSource :
00123     public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00124 
00125 public:
00126 
00132     EGS_CollimatedSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec,
00133                          EGS_BaseShape *sshape, EGS_BaseShape *tshape,
00134                          const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00135         EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), source_shape(sshape),
00136         target_shape(tshape), dist(1), ctry(0) {
00137         setUp();
00138     };
00139 
00144     EGS_CollimatedSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00145     ~EGS_CollimatedSource() {
00146         EGS_Object::deleteObject(source_shape);
00147         EGS_Object::deleteObject(target_shape);
00148     };
00149 
00150     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00151                               EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00152         //x = source_shape->getPoint(rndm);
00153         x = source_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00154         int ntry = 0;
00155         do {
00156             target_shape->getPointSourceDirection(x,rndm,u,wt);
00157             ntry++;
00158             if (ntry > 10000)
00159                 egsFatal("EGS_CollimatedSource::getPositionDirection:\n"
00160                          "  my target shape %s, which is of type %s, failed to\n"
00161                          "  return a positive weight after 10000 attempts\n",
00162                          target_shape->getObjectName().c_str(),
00163                          target_shape->getObjectType().c_str());
00164         }
00165         while (wt <= 0);
00166         //egsInformation("got x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g) wt = %g ntry = %d\n",
00167         //        x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,wt,ntry);
00168         ctry += ntry;
00169     };
00170 
00171     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00172         double res = ctry;
00173         return res/(dist*dist);
00174     };
00175 
00176     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &data) const {
00177         return egsStoreI64(data,ctry);
00178     };
00179 
00180     bool setFluenceState(istream &data) {
00181         return egsGetI64(data,ctry);
00182     };
00183 
00184     bool addFluenceData(istream &data) {
00185         EGS_I64 tmp;
00186         bool ok = egsGetI64(data,tmp);
00187         if (!ok) {
00188             return false;
00189         }
00190         ctry += tmp;
00191         return true;
00192     };
00193 
00194     bool isValid() const {
00195         return (s != 0 && source_shape != 0 && target_shape != 0 &&
00196                 target_shape->supportsDirectionMethod());
00197     };
00198 
00199     void resetFluenceCounter() {
00200         ctry = 0;
00201     };
00202 
00203 protected:
00204 
00205     EGS_BaseShape *source_shape,  
00206                   *target_shape;  
00207     EGS_I64       ctry;           
00208     EGS_Float     dist;           
00209 
00210     void setUp();
00211 
00212 };
00213 
00214 #endif
